com.sun.identity.sm.ldap

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.identity.sm.ldap.Statistics
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Statistics
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Statistics implementation used by the store to keep track of the number and type of received requests. Statistics can be enabled/disabled using the configuration file.
    Author:
    steve
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
